title: Deep learning-based characterization of neutrophil activation phenotypes in ex vivo human Candida blood infections

tldr.text: The applied CNN demonstrates the potential for automatically differentiating bloodstream Candida infections with high accuracy and efficiency and is analysed using explainable artificial intelligence (XAI) techniques to understand the critical features and patterns, thereby shedding light on potential key morphodynamic characteristics of neutrophils in response to different Candida species.
